text:
I actually found a API that could be used for 3D models, Its called <https://sketchfab.com/developers/viewer|SketchFab>, the viewer script requires certain permissions from HubSpot in order for it to work. Is something that I can configure to allow?

NOTE: In order to load correctly, the Sketchfab viewer must run various scripts, access browser cookies, and make requests to other resources on Sketchfab’s servers. If your website sandboxes iframes for security purposes, you must lift certain restrictions. This is very common in various WordPress configurations, for example. To ensure all viewer features function correctly, and to abide by our terms of use, you should include the following values in the `sandbox` attribute:
• `allow-scripts`
• `allow-same-origin`
• `allow-popups`
• `allow-forms`
When running local development through the CLI on a portal that runs CMS Starter we can no longer use the watch command
Wasn’t an issue some time ago at all

would you be willing to remove the account `hs accounts remove accountID`
then reauth and update the personal access token when you are sent to the auth page
can you see if that magically resolves it.  if not, i will look into it further
We can try, however it’s all the accounts that the developer has access to
except those that run PRO license (and probably Enterprise too)
ok.  will see if i can replicate
Back in 7, need to drive my son to soccer practice :slightly_smiling_face:
i just tested on a starter acct and didnt have any issues :thinkonk:

is the problem specific to one developer or are many developers having this issue?
i would ask them to make sure that they have updated the cli as well just in case

Ok thanks. I’ll ask him to follow your steps.

Well it’s our company account which we use to access all portals we are invited to
if that doesnt resolve it, please file a support ticket.  you can send me a dm with the support ticket number and i will make sure to keep an eye on it

Reminder: Don’t forget to keep your HubSpot CLI up to date to ensure you have the latest CLI features, bug/usability fixes and performance improvements. • <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#upgrade|How to upgrade your CLI to the latest version>.
